question: How does Audionotes.app function?
answer: Audionotes.app leverages advanced AI models, including OpenAI~s Whisper and other audio models, to transcribe, summarize, and process the text efficiently and accurately.

question: Can I record audio from two sources on my device simultaneously?
answer: Our app captures audio input exvlusively from your devices microphone. We do not support recording audio from other sources, such as speakers.

question: What are the audio length limitations on the app?
answer: Our free plan supports up to5 minutes per note, while our basic and premium plans support up to 15 minutes and 60 minutes per note, respectively. For longer notes/podcast-pls check out podnotes (www.podnotes.app)

question: How can I reach out for support?
answer: For any queries or assistance, please email us at vatsal@audionotes.app. We strive to respond within 24 hours.

question: Do you provide refunds?
answer: We do not offer refunds. However, users can test the app for free before deciding to purchase one of our premium plans.

question: Do you support languages other than English?
answer: Yes, we support 19 languages - Dutch, English (en, en-AU, en-US, en-GB, en-NZ, en-IN), French, Hindi, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Mandarin, Norwegian, Polish,Portugueese, Russian, Spanish, Swediesh, Turkish, Ukranian
